short_description: nosh lafayette is a groceries store based in louisiana, united states.
long_description: we are natural, organic, sustainable, healthy. we have always been fascinated by the way food has allowed us to have a universal language. at nosh, we personally source the freshest premium produce, seasonal products, and imported cheeses or (cheese) and delicacies to create beautiful pieces that are sure to be unforgettable. allow us to serve you for your next birthday, celebration, corporate function, or social gathering. we are excited to help bring this phenomenal business to you, as gathering and grazing has always been a part of our lives, we hope nosh will be a forever part of yours too. we partner with local businesses and ethical vendors. we use environmentally sustainable products made from birch, pine, fallen palm leaves, and recyclable paper. you may purchase disposables in sets. i am kristeigh, the face behind the brand. growing up in the south i believe gathering is more than just a word, and food in louisiana is a common bond that has always brought people together. to create lasting partnerships and memories through the many moments that you will bring nosh along with you.

generated_description: nosh lafayette, legally known as nosh lafayette gather and graze llc., based in lafayette, louisiana, is a curated charcuterie business located in the oil center. the company specializes in charcuterie boxes, platters, and lavish grazing tables, catering to events such as weddings, corporate functions, and social gatherings. nosh lafayette emphasizes the use of fresh, premium produce, seasonal products, and imported cheeses, sourcing ingredients to create memorable and beautiful charcuterie offerings. the company is committed to sustainability, using environmentally friendly materials like birch, pine, fallen palm leaves, and recyclable paper, and minimizing the use of plastic and wastage.
